name.br: Vaso de Flores Anciãs do Amor

description.en: Increases Max HP by +300, Attack Power by 15%, and Exp gain by 10% for 1 hour. Once expired, the item is consumed.
description.ar: Increases Max HP by +300, Attack Power by 15%, and Exp gain by 10% for 1 hour. Once expired, the item is consumed.
description.br: Aumenta a vida máxima (HP) em 300, o Ataque em 15% e o ganho de Exp em 10% por 1 hora. Uma vez expirado, o item é consumido.
description.cns: 最大生命值+300，攻击力增加15%，经验增加10%，持续1小时。 一旦过期，该物品就会被消耗掉。
description.de: Erhöht deine HP um +300, deine Angriffskraft um 15% und deine EXP um 10% für eine Stunde. Sobald es abgelaufen ist, ist der Gegenstand verbraucht.
description.fi: Increases Max HP by +300, Attack Power by 15%, and Exp gain by 10% for 1 hour. Once expired, the item is consumed.
description.fil: Increases Max HP by +300, Attack Power by 15%, and Exp gain by 10% for 1 hour. Once expired, the item is consumed.
description.fr: PV max +300, attaque +15%, EXP +10% (1h). Disparaît ensuite.
description.id: Meningkatkan Max HP sebesar +300, Attack Power sebesar 15%, dan Exp gain sebesar 10% selama 1 jam. Setelah kedaluwarsa, item tersebut dikonsumsi.
description.it: Increases Max HP by +300, Attack Power by 15%, and Exp gain by 10% for 1 hour. Once expired, the item is consumed.
description.jp: 1時間、最大HPが+300、追加攻撃力+15%、経験値+10%増加します。使用後は消費されます。
description.kr: 1시간 동안 최대 체력이 +300, 공격력이 10%, 경험치 획득량이 10% 증가합니다. 유통기한이 끝나면 아이템이 사라집니다.
description.nl: Increases Max HP by +300, Attack Power by 15%, and Exp gain by 10% for 1 hour. Once expired, the item is consumed.
description.pl: Increases Max HP by +300, Attack Power by 15%, and Exp gain by 10% for 1 hour. Once expired, the item is consumed.
description.ru: Increases Max HP by +300, Attack Power by 15%, and Exp gain by 10% for 1 hour. Once expired, the item is consumed.
description.sp: Aumenta la Máx. HP en +300, el Poder de Ataque en un 15% y la Exp en un 10% durante 1 hora. Cuando expira, el objeto se consume.
description.sw: Increases Max HP by +300, Attack Power by 15%, and Exp gain by 10% for 1 hour. Once expired, the item is consumed.
description.th: เพิ่ม Max HP ขึ้น +300 พลังโจมตี 15% และ Exp เพิ่มขึ้น 10% เป็นเวลา 1 ชั่วโมง เมื่อหมดอายุไอเทมจะถูกใช้และหายไป
description.tw: 最大上限HP+300和攻擊力+15%，持續1小時，時間一到將會消失
description.vi: Tăng Máu tối đa thêm 300, Sức tấn công lên 15% và Điểm kinh nghiệm tăng thêm 10% trong 1 giờ. Sau khi hết hạn, vật phẩm sẽ được tiêu thụ.
